description: The veterinarian will conduct a comprehensive examination of the dog, including checking the heart, lungs, digestion, skin, eyes, ears, etc. to detect potential health problems early on.
note: This service should be performed every 6 months to ensure the best health for your dog.

description: Fully vaccinate your dog against dangerous infectious diseases such as Distemper, Parvovirus, Leptospirosis, Adenovirus, Parainfluenza, Corona, and Kennel cough.
note: Revaccination should be done according to the veterinarian's recommended schedule.

description: Trim your dog's nails neatly and cleanly to help them walk comfortably and avoid scratching their skin.
note: It is recommended to trim your dog's nails every 2-4 weeks.

description: Use specialized dog bathing and brushing products to clean their skin and coat, remove dirt and fleas, and keep them fragrant and clean.
note: It is recommended to bathe and brush your dog every 1-2 weeks.

description: Remove the ovaries/testicles of the dog to prevent reproduction.
note: Consult your veterinarian before performing surgery on your dog.
